title: HopeIsReal.org
problem: HopeIsReal needed a modern website that conveyed their mission, encouraged donations, and was easy to update internally.
solution: Designed and developed a full WordPress site with ACF blocks, custom buttons in React, and performance/accessibility optimizations.

title: Perc.org
problem: Perc.org needed a major redesign with better content organization, modern design, and easier content filtering.
solution: Created a full redesign with Gutenberg blocks (core + Kadence), implemented Alpine.js filtering using the WP REST API.

title: BuffaloCorpStore.com
problem: BuffaloCorp needed a better e-commerce experience, particularly around navigation and product search.
solution: Redesigned the storefront with a jQuery-powered mega menu and custom Gutenberg blocks for a better product discovery flow.

title: New2SATX.com
problem: A new business needed guidance and execution on building their first digital presence.
solution: Guided them through site structure and layout, implemented SEO and analytics setup using Google tools.

title: Ascent
problem: The team wanted to experiment with Full Site Editing and TailwindCSS for future projects.
solution: Led implementation of their first FSE theme, integrating Tailwind and reusable components with custom jQuery enhancements.
